DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Performed Observation Outcome Data OMOP CDM Measurement Value as Concept Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._A foreign key to a Measurement result represented as a Concept from the Standardized Vocabularies or a foreign key to an observation result stored as a Concept ID. This is applicable to measurements and observations where the result can be expressed as a Standard Concept from the Standardized Vocabularies (e.g., positive/negative, present/absent, low/high, etc.).

The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredName: OMOP CDM Measurement Value as Concept Identifier
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A foreign key to a Measurement result represented as a Concept from the Standardized Vocabularies or a foreign key to an observation result stored as a Concept ID. This is applicable to measurements and observations where the result can be expressed as a Standard Concept from the Standardized Vocabularies (e.g., positive/negative, present/absent, low/high, etc.).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ValueDomain.origin: OMOP CDM:The Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model

DataElement.origin: OMOP CDM:The Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model
DataElement.changeDescription: Based on CDMH BRIDG 5.0.2 and OMOP value set for CDM.
